how to say year vie go in spanish

The Spanish translation for "year vie go" is **año pasado**. It is pronounced as "ah-nyo pah-sah-doe".

Here are some examples of how to use the phrase "año pasado" in a sentence:

* ¿Qué hiciste el año pa
